How dull."},{"lineNumber":53009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の出番を奪いやがって」","translatedEnglishLine":"You stole my moment to shine.\""},{"lineNumber":53010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあまあ、来たからにはゆるりとしていくがいい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, now, since you've come, just relax!"},{"lineNumber":53011,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今夜は酒でも酌み交わそう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's share some drinks tonight!\""},{"lineNumber":53012,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、ばっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha, no...!"},{"lineNumber":53013,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何が哀しくてお前みたいなのと……放せーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why would I be sad enough to be with someone like you... let me goーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":53014,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーに連れられて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Escorted by Gandhi,"},{"lineNumber":53015,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは宮殿へと消えていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance disappeared into the palace."},{"lineNumber":53016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……終わった、わね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... it's over now.\""},{"lineNumber":53017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゼスは一段落、というところが本当ですけど。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's true that Zeth has settled down for now."},{"lineNumber":53018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お疲れ様でした、陛下」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good work, Your Majesty.\""},{"lineNumber":53019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……慣れないなぁ、その呼ばれ方」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm not used to being called that.\""},{"lineNumber":53020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「慣れてもらわないと。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You'll have to get used to it."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンを……魔物大将軍を！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton... the Demon General!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そのようね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負傷者の手当てを！　すぐにここから動きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Treat the wounded! We will move from here immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha, haha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 号令一下、部下達が動き出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the command, the subordinates began to move.
"...We won, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザはこっそりと、安堵の溜息を長く吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza quietly let out a long sigh of relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法使いとそうでない者が、連携して得た勝利。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A victory achieved through the cooperation of magicians and non-magicians.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍には知らぬ事だろうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon General probably doesn't know this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以前のゼスであれば、こうはやれなかっただろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the previous Zeth wouldn't have been able to do this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やったわ、みんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We did it, everyone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を少しだけ伏せ、拳を握って、ウルザは呟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lowering her eyes slightly and clenching her fist, Ulza murmured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔物大将軍ツォトン、敗死。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Demon General Tsoton, defeated and dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、ゼスを蹂躙していた魔軍が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This meant that the demon army that had been ravaging Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いわば頭を潰されたのと同様の意味を持っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was, so to speak, decapitated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時にマジノラインも陥落し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, the Maginot Line fell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開戦時、実に100万を数えた大兵団は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the army that had numbered one million at the start of the war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついにゼスの前に膝を屈した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: finally knelt before Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍は統制を失った魔軍の逃亡を妨害はせず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth army did not obstruct the retreat of the demon army that had lost control,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的にその後背を襲い、魔物界へと追い散らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but thoroughly attacked their rear and scattered them back into the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占領されていた街からは歓声が轟き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cheers echoed from the occupied towns,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある者は生き残った喜びに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some rejoiced at surviving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある者は犠牲となった同胞に祈り、涙した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: others prayed and wept for their fallen comrades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な……なんだと？　大将軍、倒してしまったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... What? You defeated the great general?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。ゼスの総力を集めて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. We gathered all of Zeth's strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ来て頂いて、すみません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you for coming all this way, sorry about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぬぬ……俺様の出番が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Grrr... my moment to shine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 颯爽と大将軍を片付けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was going to swiftly take care of the general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス中の美女を頂こうと思ったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then claim all the beauties in Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、残念でしたね。総統閣下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, tough luck, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ！　まこと、あっぱれな勝利であった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed! Truly, a splendid victory it was."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　片付けたのはお前じゃなかったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? Weren't you the one who finished him off?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、手助け程度だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, it was just a little help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは……ゼスの全ての者が勝ち取った成果と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is... the achievement won by all the people of Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってよい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you could say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……そうかよ、つまらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... is that so? How dull.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の出番を奪いやがって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You stole my moment to shine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ、来たからにはゆるりとしていくがいい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, since you've come, just relax!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜は酒でも酌み交わそう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's share some drinks tonight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、ばっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha, no...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が哀しくてお前みたいなのと……放せーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why would I be sad enough to be with someone like you... let me goーーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーに連れられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Escorted by Gandhi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは宮殿へと消えていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance disappeared into the palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……終わった、わね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... it's over now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスは一段落、というところが本当ですけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's true that Zeth has settled down for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お疲れ様でした、陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good work, Your Majesty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……慣れないなぁ、その呼ばれ方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm not used to being called that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「慣れてもらわないと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You'll have to get used to it.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンを……魔物大将軍を！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton... the Demon General!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そのようね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負傷者の手当てを！　すぐにここから動きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Treat the wounded! We will move from here immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha, haha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 号令一下、部下達が動き出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the command, the subordinates began to move.
"...We won, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザはこっそりと、安堵の溜息を長く吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ulza quietly let out a long sigh of relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法使いとそうでない者が、連携して得た勝利。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A victory achieved through the cooperation of magicians and non-magicians.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍には知らぬ事だろうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon General probably doesn't know this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以前のゼスであれば、こうはやれなかっただろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the previous Zeth wouldn't have been able to do this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やったわ、みんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We did it, everyone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を少しだけ伏せ、拳を握って、ウルザは呟いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lowering her eyes slightly and clenching her fist, Ulza murmured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔物大将軍ツォトン、敗死。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Demon General Tsoton, defeated and dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、ゼスを蹂躙していた魔軍が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This meant that the demon army that had been ravaging Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いわば頭を潰されたのと同様の意味を持っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was, so to speak, decapitated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時にマジノラインも陥落し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, the Maginot Line fell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開戦時、実に100万を数えた大兵団は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the army that had numbered one million at the start of the war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついにゼスの前に膝を屈した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: finally knelt before Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍は統制を失った魔軍の逃亡を妨害はせず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Zeth army did not obstruct the retreat of the demon army that had lost control,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的にその後背を襲い、魔物界へと追い散らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but thoroughly attacked their rear and scattered them back into the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占領されていた街からは歓声が轟き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cheers echoed from the occupied towns,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある者は生き残った喜びに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some rejoiced at surviving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある者は犠牲となった同胞に祈り、涙した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: others prayed and wept for their fallen comrades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then——

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な……なんだと？　大将軍、倒してしまったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... What? You defeated the great general?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。ゼスの総力を集めて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. We gathered all of Zeth's strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ来て頂いて、すみません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you for coming all this way, sorry about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぬぬ……俺様の出番が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Grrr... my moment to shine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 颯爽と大将軍を片付けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was going to swiftly take care of the general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス中の美女を頂こうと思ったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then claim all the beauties in Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、残念でしたね。総統閣下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, tough luck, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ！　まこと、あっぱれな勝利であった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed! Truly, a splendid victory it was."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　片付けたのはお前じゃなかったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? Weren't you the one who finished him off?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、手助け程度だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, it was just a little help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは……ゼスの全ての者が勝ち取った成果と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is... the achievement won by all the people of Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってよい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you could say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……そうかよ、つまらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... is that so? How dull.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の出番を奪いやがって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You stole my moment to shine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ、来たからにはゆるりとしていくがいい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, since you've come, just relax!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜は酒でも酌み交わそう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's share some drinks tonight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、ばっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha, no...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が哀しくてお前みたいなのと……放せーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why would I be sad enough to be with someone like you... let me goーーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーに連れられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Escorted by Gandhi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは宮殿へと消えていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance disappeared into the palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……終わった、わね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... it's over now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスは一段落、というところが本当ですけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's true that Zeth has settled down for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お疲れ様でした、陛下」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good work, Your Majesty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……慣れないなぁ、その呼ばれ方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm not used to being called that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「慣れてもらわないと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You'll have to get used to it.
